# Example: Auto-Generated README.md Files

When you download videos or audio, the script automatically creates `README.md` files in each folder with comprehensive information about the downloaded content.

## Example README.md Content

### Single Video Download

```markdown
# Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

## Channel Information

- **Channel Name:** Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar
- **Channel ID:** UC4qz5w2M-Xmju7WC9ynqRtw
- **Uploader ID:** @gurudev
- **Channel URL:** https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4qz5w2M-Xmju7WC9ynqRtw
- **Upload Date:** 2020-06-14

## Downloaded Files

### Audio Files
- **14th_June_-_Evening_Guided_Meditation.mp3** (25M)

## Additional Files

### Metadata
- 14th_June_-_Evening_Guided_Meditation.info.json (Complete metadata)

### Descriptions
- 14th_June_-_Evening_Guided_Meditation.description (Video description)

### Thumbnails
- 14th_June_-_Evening_Guided_Meditation.webp

---

*Generated on Sun 11 Jan 2026 01:39:56 PM CET by [YouTubeDL](https://github.com/karol-preiskorn/YouTubeDL)*
```

### Playlist Download

```markdown
# Educational Channel

## Channel Information

- **Channel Name:** Educational Channel
- **Channel ID:** UC1234567890ABCDEF
- **Uploader ID:** @educational
- **Channel URL:** https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1234567890ABCDEF

## Playlist Information

- **Playlist:** Complete Programming Course
- **Playlist ID:** PLxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

## Downloaded Files

### Video Files
- **001 - Introduction_to_Programming.mkv** (120M)
- **002 - Variables_and_Data_Types.mkv** (95M)
- **003 - Control_Flow_Statements.mkv** (110M)

### Subtitles
- 001 - Introduction_to_Programming.en.srt
- 002 - Variables_and_Data_Types.en.srt

## Additional Files

### Metadata
- 001 - Introduction_to_Programming.info.json (Complete metadata)
- 002 - Variables_and_Data_Types.info.json (Complete metadata)
- 003 - Control_Flow_Statements.info.json (Complete metadata)

### Descriptions
- 001 - Introduction_to_Programming.description (Video description)
- 002 - Variables_and_Data_Types.description (Video description)
- 003 - Control_Flow_Statements.description (Video description)

---

*Generated on Sun 11 Jan 2026 01:45:22 PM CET by [YouTubeDL](https://github.com/karol-preiskorn/YouTubeDL)*
```

## Features of Auto-Generated READMEs

✅ **Channel Information**
- Channel name, ID, and URL
- Uploader ID and profile links
- Upload dates

✅ **Playlist Details** (for playlist downloads)
- Playlist title and ID
- Number of videos in playlist

✅ **File Listings**
- All downloaded media files with sizes
- Subtitle files (for video downloads)
- Metadata and description files
- Thumbnail files

✅ **Organization**
- Clearly structured sections
- File size information for easy management
- Links to original sources
- Generation timestamp

✅ **Git Tracking**
- README.md files are tracked in git (while media files are ignored)
- Preserves download history and channel information
- Easy to browse downloaded content without media players

These README files make it easy to browse your downloaded collection, understand what you have, and share information about the content without including the large media files in git repositories.
